mapper.update: update t_food_menutype set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODMENUID = #{foodmenuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODTYPECODE = #{foodtypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODTYPENAME = #{foodtypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, FOODMENUID, FOODTYPECODE, FOODTYPENAME from t_food_menutype where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, FOODMENUID, FOODTYPECODE, FOODTYPENAME from t_food_menutype
